column2:
"Ohh, it's so big...
So this is the headquarters
of Earth Guide?"

"Now, Kohri, don't run around
poking things. It's rude, since
we were invited to come here."

"Look who's talking.
This is just like a certain someone."
"Quiet you."

"Kohri Washinomiya,
I am Sir Ardem Sacred."

"Along with Enga and Hitsugi, I am
happy to meet you. One who will surely
carry the future of Earth's evolution."

"Uhh, thank you for your hospitality.
But, I'm not that amazing of a person."

"No need to be humble. For Earth--for
which has hit the limit in its evolution--
those who can use ether, such as
yourself, are the key to evolution."
"I hope you all can take pride in your abilities. That power will usher in a new evolution to the Earth, a light of hope. Realize that you will carry on to next era of the Earth."

"Even if you told me all of that,
I'm content if I could just stay alongside Hitsugi."

"All I want to do is save Aru.
So all that stuff is rather...
Big bro, I'm counting on your support."

"I'm already sick of hearing that.
You're going to say that to everyone, aye."
"Of course, it's a fact."

"This is something that we can't just
rely on <%me> or ARKS for.
This is a problem for Earth alone."
"Evolution on Earth has stagnated. And if we don't push people who have reached their limits into a new stage, all that awaits us is Earth's demise."
"While defeating Mother is important, planning for the future is just as important as well."
"That sounds like something a salesman would pitch. Careful, or you might get caught up in your own words."
"It's alright. I'm confident in your abilities, Enga."
"Oh right, I had a meeting scheduled. My apologies, but I must take my leave now. Please, make yourself at home."
"Ardem looks really busy."
"Well, he holds a lot of influence, so he's being dragged into different conflicts as a mediator and negotiator."
"I'm sure he's well rewarded for his help, so there's no need for sympathies for him."
"I kinda don't like him. He rubs me as sort of insane."

"Insane you say...
He's always suffering due to the world, but recently, he does seem different."
